attributes.additional_details: I would like the government to do this because if sporting events/ music festivals can go ahead with 1000 spectators with being covid tested before hand then the same can be done for weddings. Wedding will have alot less attendees than sporting events and music festivals which will be alot safer.
attributes.background: Lift all wedding restrictions in place at this current time and for attendees to be covid tested before entry

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/588937
